channel.title: Questions about RSCD 25 WWW files
channel.description:
Alright so Im working with a few guys on a server called "RSCLegends" and we are using the latest fluxBB with RSCD 25 player registration added in, it works like it normally would on punBB of course, however Kryptix has found a way to exploit the page and get encrypted passwords.
Is there anyone that would be willing to explain whats going on, or show me the right direction toward securing our forum?
Thanks in advance :P

item.title: Questions about RSCD 25 WWW files
item.dc:creator: @JosephLazarus JosephLazarus
item.description:
@JosephLazarus wrote:

I mean luke im not implying that you hacked us or did us wrong, im stating the situation.

I know a bit of php, yes - I just cant figure out what this/these exploit(s) are/is, nor have I seen it happen personally. (So i dont know what part of the script lets such and such happen)

Im just trying to get a little guidance man.

Read full topic
